multiple_choice.question: What did the crows get everyday?
Where did Anansi the Spider fall?

fill_in_the_blanks.question: Anansi took a gourd full of water and went to the tree where the hornets lived
Anansi carried the stories triumphantly down to earth
People down on earth had no stories to tell and they were very sad

meanings.thread: a long, thin strand of fibre
meanings.swallow: cause or allow something to pass down the throat

meanings.argument: an exchange of diverging or opposite views
